content: Does anyone know about CDISC Vaccine Administration specification https://www.vaccineadministration.org/ ? I'm receiving questions about it and wonder how it relates, if at all, to the work of Smart Health Cards.
I'm not familiar; since I see Brian Martin from the MITRE team was involved, wondering if @Max Masnick or @Neelima Karipineni may know more.

@Nathan Bunker I attended a couple of the CDISC meetings ages ago but haven't heard anything since then. In their released vaccine administration data elements, it looks like they attempted to harmonize existing standards but didn't include the SHC IGs (just WHO, CDC, EHN).
Thanks. That was my take as well. I'll tell you if I learn anything that is relevant to SHC.
